abstract: Rutgers receiver Leonte Carroo is arrested on simple assault charge in domestic violence incident after football game; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Receiver Leonte Carroo faces an assault under domestic violence count after an episode involving Rutgers police on Saturday.
